title: Romanische font
content:
Any comment on this first try at text font used in G magazine would be welcome. Thanks to Bleisetzer and wmayer for information on this.

Merci a l'avance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417182951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gmagtypophile_3493.jpg)
author: Richard Hunt

comments.content: Some of the stroke weights seem not right. Also the g and y do not go together. Bottom of u not good. This typeface reminds me a little bit of Benguiat. It is too strange to use for a lot of text, but is interesting for a small amount. But does not really look like display typeface either.
